list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark of disgrace associated with a particular circumstance, quality, or person.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the stigma of having gone to prison will always be with me
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự kỳ thị của việc đi tù sẽ luôn ở bên tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in Christian tradition) marks corresponding to those left on Jesus’ body by the Crucifixion, said to have been impressed by divine favor on the bodies of St. Francis of Assisi and others.
a visible sign or characteristic of a disease.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: knee deformities or other stigmata of childhood rickets
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: dị tật đầu gối hoặc stigmata khác của bệnh còi xương nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in a flower) the part of a pistil that receives the pollen during pollination.
